languages.text: "Да". {n}Кажется, Кибеллу не волнует ни смерть хирургеона, ни близость наказания. Ее задумчивый темный взгляд блуждает по мостику.{/n} "Это была я".

traits.locale_text: "Признаю" {n}, — произносит она отчужденно. Кажется, Кибеллу не волнует ни смерть хирургеона, ни близость сурового наказания. Ее мысли смущает нечто иное. Нечто сокрытое от вашего понимания.{/n}

languages.text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."
languages.original_text: "Да". {n}Кажется, Кибеллу не волнует ни смерть хирургеона, ни близость наказания. Ее задумчивый темный взгляд блуждает по мостику.{/n} "Это была я".

traits.locale_text: "Yes." {n}Kibellah seems untroubled by either the Chirurgeon's death or her own impending punishment. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."
"Yes." {n}Kibellah seems untroubled by either the Chirurgeon's death or her own impending punishment. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

"Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death or her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

languages.text: « Oui. » {n}Kibellah ne semble être perturbée ni par la mort du chirurgeon ni par son châtiment à venir. Elle contente de promener un regard sombre et pensif sur la passerelle.{/n} « C'était moi. »
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

traits.locale_text: « Oui. » {n}Kibellah ne semble être perturbée ni par la mort du chirurgeon ni par son châtiment à venir. Elle contente de promener un regard sombre et pensif sur la passerelle.{/n} « C'était moi. »

languages.text: «Sí». {n}Ni la muerte del cirujano ni su inminente castigo parecen perturbar a Kibellah. Su mirada oscura y pensativa recorre el puente.{/n} «Fui yo».
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

traits.locale_text: «Sí». {n}Ni la muerte del cirujano ni su inminente castigo parecen perturbar a Kibellah. Su mirada oscura y pensativa recorre el puente.{/n} «Fui yo».

languages.text: 「えぇ」{n}チラージョンの死も、これから行われる自分への罰も、キベラにはどうでもよさそうだ。彼女のぼんやりとした暗い視線は、ブリッジをゆらりと泳いでいる。{/n}「私がやったのよ」
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

traits.locale_text: 「えぇ」{n}チラージョンの死も、これから行われる自分への罰も、キベラにはどうでもよさそうだ。彼女のぼんやりとした暗い視線は、ブリッジをゆらりと泳いでいる。{/n}「私がやったのよ」

languages.text: “没错。”{n}无论是船医总管的死，还是她自己即将面临的惩罚，绮贝菈似乎都没有放在心上。她阴暗、深邃的目光在舰桥上徘徊。{/n}“是我干的。”
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

traits.locale_text: “没错。”{n}无论是船医总管的死，还是她自己即将面临的惩罚，绮贝菈似乎都没有放在心上。她阴暗、深邃的目光在舰桥上徘徊。{/n}“是我干的。”

languages.text: "Ja." {n}Weder der Tod des Chirurgeums noch ihre eigene bevorstehende Bestrafung scheinen Kibellah zu beunruhigen. Ihr nachdenklicher, dunkler Blick schweift über die Brücke.{/n} "Ich war es."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."

traits.locale_text: "Ja." {n}Weder der Tod des Chirurgeums noch ihre eigene bevorstehende Bestrafung scheinen Kibellah zu beunruhigen. Ihr nachdenklicher, dunkler Blick schweift über die Brücke.{/n} "Ich war es."

languages.text: "Evet." {n}Görünüşe göre Kibellah'yı ne cerrahın ölümü ne de alacağı ceza rahatsız ediyor. Koyu renkli gözlerinin dalgın bakışlarıyla köprüyü süzüyor.{/n} "Ben öldürdüm."
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}Neither the chirurgeon's death nor her own impending punishment seem to trouble Kibellah. Her pensive dark gaze wanders around the bridge.{/n} "It was me."
